channel.title: postgresql on PaulRz
channel.description: Recent content in postgresql on PaulRz

item.title: PostgreSQL and its quirks
item.description: From the beginning of my career I’ve always been working with Oracle Database, from 8i till 12c, on online transaction processing (OLTP). The database is safe, reliable and - Ask Tom! - it’s great. And as saying goes, “you’ve never got in trouble by buying Oracle”. OLTP loads usually require low latency and high transaction rate. Under different load profiles it was quite simple to come up with a solution of any performance problem.
